traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Yinra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: Yinra has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
